LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LoanPortfolioExpense.label: Loan Portfolio Expense
LoanPortfolioExpense.description: The loan servicing fees paid to third parties that relate to loan expenses for a portfolio containing the entire group of loans owned by the company.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Assets, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets recognized in investing activities.

Capital.label: Banking Regulation, Total Capital, Actual
Capital.description: Amount of total capital as defined by regulatory framework.

DirectOperatingMaintenanceSuppliesCosts.label: Direct Operating Maintenance Supplies Costs
DirectOperatingMaintenanceSuppliesCosts.description: Costs of maintenance supplies used that are directly related to goods produced and sold, or services rendered, during the reporting period.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities and Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedLiabilitiesAndO.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accrued expenses, and obligations classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInFinancialInstrumentsUs.label: Increase (Decrease) in Financial Instruments Used in Operating Activities
IncreaseDecreaseInFinancialInstrumentsUs.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of financial instruments used in operating activities, including trading securities, risk management instruments, and other short-term trading instruments.

Investments.label: Investments
Investments.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all investments.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

AlternativeInvestment.label: Alternative Investment
AlternativeInvestment.description: Fair value of investment other than investment in equity security, investment in debt security and equity method investment. Includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Example includes, but is not limited to, investment in hedge fund, venture capital fund, private equity fund, and real estate partnership or fund.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Investment Real Estate
GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of real estate owned for investment purposes.

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.
